properties.displayName: Potential Arbitrary Command Execution Via FTP.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\ftp.exe" or ((ProcessCommandLine contains "-s:" or ProcessCommandLine contains "/s:") and (FolderPath endswith "\\ftp.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "ftp.exe"))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of "ftp.exe" script with the "-s" or "/s" flag and any child processes ran by "ftp.exe".
